const YetNotConvinced = () => { return (
{/* Left Column - Benefits */}
{/* 100% Author Royalty */}

100% Author Royalty

Retain full earnings from every book sold. Leverage our distributor network to build your author brand and implement growth strategies.

{/* Monthly Sales & Payout */}

Transparent Monthly Reporting

Access real-time sales data and receive monthly royalty payments. No more waiting for quarterly statements - stay informed and paid regularly.

{/* Worldwide Distribution */}

Global Distribution Network

Reach readers in 150+ countries through our partnerships with leading global distributors. Available in both paperback and eBook formats.

{/* Right Column - Call to Action */}

Still Have Questions?

Get personalized publishing guidance from manuscript to global distribution. Schedule a free consultation or explore our comprehensive FAQ section.

Mon-Fri: 9AM - 7PM IST
); }; export default YetNotConvinced;
